welcome_message_body: Welcome to Thandwe, Burma! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's beautiful beaches, vibrant local culture, and delicious seafood. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Thandwe has to offer.

restaurants.name: Excellence Seafood Restaurant
restaurants.description: Excellence Seafood Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Green Umbrella
restaurants.description: Green Umbrella is a seafood restaurant located in Myapin Village.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thandwe Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 2 hours. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.
